title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Technology-Enhanced Mathematics Learning Design for Higher Cognitive Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics comprehension (secondary level) and fundamental digital device usage
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply critical thinking strategies to analyze mathematical problems encountered in real-world job situations.
Learners can design systematic processes for solving complex mathematical problems using simulation and game-based tools.
Learners can enhance their mathematical reasoning skills by collecting and incorporating peer feedback through online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
